name: Friend Zone: Undress Me
description:
If you enjoyed the game, support it(and us) by rating and/or dropping comments! Each one of you counts!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ What happened yesterday night at the valentine's day party? A scandalous post from the night before, your boyfriend giving a  black eye to... your secret valentine? 💕Diamond- You play as Diamond (Nameable), a college freshman struggling to find herself and where she belongs. Her first battle is to decide who she wants. 💕Choose your valentine! With their own unique relationships with Diamond. It's up to you to decide who you grow close to at your forbidden get-together. 💕Each scene has life and movement to make for an eye-capturing reading experience. 💕This is the first in a series of short stories that will expand the universe of this campus This game was made by me "MoonCaustics" (Artist/Editor) and "Beastcarving"(Coding/Writer/UI), check out our other projects!
